generate negative markers from a list of exclusive positive markers

Source: R/utils.R
reverse_marker_matrix.Rd

generate negative markers from a list of exclusive positive markers

reverse_marker_matrix(mat)

Arguments

mat

matrix or dataframe of markers

Value

matrix of gene names

Examples

reverse_marker_matrix(cbmc_m)
#>         CD4 T      CD8 T Memory CD4 T CD14+ Mono Naive CD4 T         NK
#> 1        CD8B      ITM2A        ITM2A      ITM2A       ITM2A      ITM2A
#> 2       ADCY2      ADCY2         CD8B       CD8B        CD8B       CD8B
#> 3      S100A8     S100A8       S100A8      ADCY2       ADCY2      ADCY2
#> 4       CDHR3      CDHR3        CDHR3      CDHR3      S100A8     S100A8
#> 5        GNLY       GNLY         GNLY       GNLY        GNLY      CDHR3
#> 6        IGHM       IGHM         IGHM       IGHM        IGHM       IGHM
#> 7      CDKN1C     CDKN1C       CDKN1C     CDKN1C      CDKN1C     CDKN1C
#> 8      SPINK2     SPINK2       SPINK2     SPINK2      SPINK2     SPINK2
#> 9         HBM        HBM          HBM        HBM         HBM        HBM
#> 10        PF4        PF4          PF4        PF4         PF4        PF4
#> 11       ENHO       ENHO         ENHO       ENHO        ENHO       ENHO
#> 12     LILRA4     LILRA4       LILRA4     LILRA4      LILRA4     LILRA4
#> 13       CD8A      TXNIP        TXNIP      TXNIP       TXNIP      TXNIP

#> 15     S100A9     S100A9       S100A9     PTGDR2      PTGDR2     PTGDR2
#> 16 DICER1-AS1 DICER1-AS1   DICER1-AS1 DICER1-AS1      S100A9     S100A9
